channel.description: Recent content in office on Jeff Glass

item.title: Home Office Overhaul
item.description: You may get the impression from this blog that I like to dabble in a lot of different projects. You're not wrong - I love trying new hobbies, new technologies, new recipies, new stuff. But one of the issues is that the old projects (and the pieces and tools that come with them) tend to pile up in my workspace. So with a kindly nudge from my partner, I decided it was time to overhaul my home office setup.
